Package JSci.physics.relativity

Class Summary
EMFieldTensor The EMFieldTensor class encapsulates the electromagnetic field tensor.
KroneckerDelta The KroneckerDelta class encapsulates the Kronecker delta.
LeviCivita The LeviCivita class encapsulates the Levi-Civita tensor.
LorentzBoost The LorentzBoost class encapsulates the Lorentz boosts.
MinkowskiMetric The MinkowskiMetric class encapsulates the Minkowski metric.
Rank1Tensor The Rank1Tensor class encapsulates 1st rank tensors.
Rank2Tensor The Rank2Tensor class encapsulates 2nd rank tensors.
Rank3Tensor The Rank3Tensor class encapsulates 3rd rank tensors.
Rank4Tensor The Rank4Tensor class encapsulates 4th rank tensors.
Tensor The Tensor superclass provides an abstract encapsulation for tensors.
